title: Pattern Matching with Wildcards
description:
Match a string against a pattern containing wildcards.

Wildcards:
- `?` matches any single character
- `*` matches any sequence of characters (including empty)

## Input Format
- First line: string s
- Second line: pattern p

## Output Format
- "true" if pattern matches string, "false" otherwise
constraints:
- 0 ≤ len(s) ≤ 2000
- 0 ≤ len(p) ≤ 2000
- s contains lowercase letters only
- p contains lowercase letters, `?`, and `*`
